name: Slow Cooker Chicken Tinga
author: angelosmommy
summary: A spicy chicken and chile dish. A good friend of mine from Guadalajara who works hard to make this on the stove inspired me to make my own version in the slow cooker. Serve on tostada shells and garnish with chopped cilantro and onions.
ingredients: 1 (7 ounce) can chipotle chile peppers in adobo sauce, chopped and seeded
2  fresh jalapeno peppers, seeded and chopped
directions: Mix chicken, onion, tomato sauce, chipotle chile peppers in adobo sauce, jalapeno peppers, garlic, oregano, cumin, chili powder, and red pepper flakes in a slow cooker
Cook on Low until chicken is no longer pink in the center, 2 to 3 hours
Remove chicken from slow cooker and shred using 2 forks; return to the slow cooker
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir chorizo sausage in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 10 minutes; drain and discard grease
Cook on Low for 45 minutes to 1 hour
